statements: SELECT * FROM Directions WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT origin_address, destination_address FROM Directions WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT route_id, duration FROM Directions WHERE destination_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM Directions ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Directions;
SELECT * FROM Directions WHERE route_id = '62b3f6bf-1a25-4c4b-b826-4f7c83760aa1';
SELECT route_id, origin_address, destination_address FROM Directions WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT origin_address, destination_address, distance FROM Directions WHERE distance > 100 AND duration < '2 hours';
SELECT * FROM Directions WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT route_id, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(steps) AS steps_count FROM Directions WHERE route_id = 'b7614ad2-8944-4024-b4c9-42d26f72f701';
SELECT * FROM directions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT origin, destination FROM directions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40.7 AND longitude > -74.0;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT destination, origin FROM directions ORDER BY destination ASC, origin DESC;
SELECT * FROM directions WHERE origin = 'New York';
SELECT destination FROM directions WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT id, origin AS start_location, destination AS end_location FROM directions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM directions JOIN locations ON directions.id = locations.id;
SELECT * FROM directions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT origin, destination FROM directions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route FROM directions WHERE origin LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM directions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT origin, destination FROM directions WHERE route LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT id, address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM directions WHERE distance > 10
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM directions WHERE id = 3
SELECT route FROM directions ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM favorites
SELECT * FROM directions WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM directions WHERE end_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, route FROM directions WHERE route IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM favorites WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY user_id, location_name;
SELECT user_id, search_query, timestamp FROM search_history WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM directions;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM directions WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT map_name, map_provider FROM maps ORDER BY map_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT route_name, start_location_id, end_location_id, map_id FROM routes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM directions WHERE id = 1
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM directions WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT routes.route_name, locations.location_name, maps.map_name FROM routes JOIN locations ON routes.start_location_id = locations.id JOIN maps ON routes.map_id = maps.id

SELECT directions.start_location, directions.end_location, routes.route_name, traffic_updates.update_text FROM directions JOIN routes ON directions.id = routes.start_location_id JOIN traffic_updates ON routes.id = traffic_updates.route_id

SELECT routes.route_name, traffic_updates.update_text, traffic_updates.update_time FROM routes JOIN traffic_updates ON routes.id = traffic_updates.route_id WHERE traffic_updates.update_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY traffic_updates.update_time ASC
